motis-project/motis

Open-source platform for large-scale multi-modal transport routing

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Backend framework for building APIs, automations, and AI workflows with code and events
  • AI gateway for agentic apps, handles routing, guardrails, and LLM integration
  • CLI coding agent that runs locally with your choice of model or API
  • open-source coding assistant with agentic features, supports Claude, GPT-4o, Gemini, and local LLMs
  • open-source framework for building and connecting AI agent networks
  • zero trust networking for apps, mesh overlay, smart routing, sdk support
  • Multi-modal trip planner for public transportation
  • Open source AI gateway without API harmonization
